lines.title: Ecommerce Order Lines
lines.description: An array of objects, each representing an order's line item.

items.title: E-commerce Order Line Item
items.description: Information about a specific order line.

id.title: Order Line Item Foreign ID
id.description: A unique identifier for an order line item.

product_id.title: Order Line Item Product Foreign ID
product_id.description: A unique identifier for the product associated with an order line item.

product_title.title: Order Line Item Product Title
product_title.description: The name of the product for an order line item.

product_variant_id.title: Order Line Item Product Variant Foreign ID
product_variant_id.description: A unique identifier for the product variant associated with an order line item.

product_variant_title.title: Order Line Item Product Variant Title
product_variant_title.description: The name of the product variant for an order line item.

image_url.title: Product Image URL
image_url.description: The image URL for a product.

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: The total discount amount applied to a line item.

_links.title: Links
_links.description: A list of link types and descriptions for the API schema documents.

items.title: Resource Link
items.description: This object represents a link from the resource where it is found to another resource or action that may be performed.

rel.title: Rel
rel.description: As with an HTML 'rel' attribute, this describes the type of link.

href.title: Href
href.description: This property contains a fully-qualified URL that can be called to retrieve the linked resource or perform the linked action.

method.title: Method
method.description: The HTTP method that should be used when accessing the URL defined in 'href'.

targetSchema.title: Target Schema
targetSchema.description: For GETs, this is a URL representing the schema that the response should conform to.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: For HTTP methods that can receive bodies (POST and PUT), this is a URL representing the schema that the body should conform to.

total_items.title: Item Count
total_items.description: The total number of items matching the query regardless of pagination.
